name: awais68-frontend-nextjs-app-router
description: Use when working with Next.js App Router tasks - creating pages in /app/, setting up dynamic routes ([id]/page.tsx), implementing nested layouts/templates (layout.tsx), optimizing Server/Client components, or building ERP role-based pages (admin/teacher/student dashboards). Auto-use for all /app/ directory operations, dynamic routing, and App Router-specific features.
